forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the horizon reveals a gentle embrace of sunlight washing over the city. A mostly sunny sky complements the cool air, with temperatures hovering just above fifty degrees. There’s a crispness to the atmosphere, hinting at the north-northwest breeze that delicately stirs the trees and rustles the leaves, fostering a serene ambiance. The marine layer, softly retreating, conspires to leave the vistas clear, save for a whisper of fog clinging to the water's edge, just shy of the Golden Gate Bridge, reminding us of the coastline’s ever-changing temperament.

As the afternoon approaches, the temperatures are expected to dip slightly, inviting a layer of warmth to combat the coolness of the lingering breeze. Dressing in layers is advisable: a light sweater or jacket will be your best companion as the day transitions into evening. With the daylight hours still favorably long, one might wander through the neighborhoods, sampling a local café’s brew or savoring the scent of toasted panini wafting through the air. Alternatively, the nearby parks call for leisurely strolls, each step accompanied by the sounds of nature blending into the urban symphony, making today not just a moment in time, but an exquisite experience to savor.
